scripts.server:start: cd server && npm i && node index.js
scripts.server:db:setup: cd server && npm i && npm run db:setup
scripts.server:db:reset: cd server && npm i && npm run db:reset
scripts.client:start: cd client && npm i && npm start
scripts.app:install: cd client && npm i && cd ../server && npm i && npm run db:setup
scripts.cypress:app: concurrently "npm run server:start" "npm run client:start" "npm run cypress"
